alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 10:35PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Harding, northwestern Butte and northwestern Perkins Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1035 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Ludlow to 6 miles southeast of Buffalo to 4 miles south of Harding to 6 miles northwest of Antelope Butte. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ralph around 1045 PM MDT. Reva, Redig, Slim Buttes and Crow Buttes around 1050 PM MDT. Haystack Buttes around 1055 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lodgepole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
